name: One Touch Drawing - Connect Dots Puzzle
name_original: One Touch Drawing - Connect Dots Puzzle
description:
One Stroke Puzzle Game.

Pass through all the lines without repeat!

[Gimmicks]
- Green line must be passed twice.
- Lines with arrows must be through going a certain direction.
- "Warp Point" will be transferred to the another "Warp Point".


Give it a try right now!!


***** Works with iPhone5+, iPad Air+ *****
